text: Fielding Patrick "Pat" Hambright II (born January 4, 1967) is an American journalist. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1967 births Category:American male journalists Category:American television reporters and correspondents Category:Colorado Mesa University alumni Category:Journalists from California Category:Journalists from Colorado Category:Journalists from Nevada Category:Television anchors from Sacramento, California Category:Living people
title: Pat Hambright
